emcInfo.summary: EMC Energy focuses on the Power and Oil & Gas markets in Egypt, aiming to deliver top-tier solutions to our clients and partners. Established in 1988, we have over 30 years of experience, achieving EGP 300 Million turnover (2020) while maintaining an uncompromising commitment to quality. Our expertise spans turnkey EPC projects, technical consulting, and after-sales services for energy infrastructure, specializing in diesel/hydrogen plants and district cooling systems.
